module.name: Feature Code Admin
module.description: The Feature Codes Module is used to enable and disable certain features available in your PBX and Asterisk, and to set the codes that local users will dial on their phones to use that particular feature.
module.changelog: *13.0.6.11* FREEPBX-21227 remove contact manger from the featurecode admin *13.0.6.10* FREEPBX-21227 *13.0.6.9* FREEPBX-21227 Remove Feature Code Admin -> Contact Mgr Speeddial as destination *13.0.6.8* FREEI-2560 Getting whoops error when trying to perform reload after the upgrade of featurecode admin module *13.0.6.7* FREEPBX-21227 Remove Feature Code Admin *13.0.6.6* Packaging of ver 13.0.6.6 *13.0.6.5* Packaging of ver 13.0.6.5 *13.0.6.4* FREEPBX-14232 FC accepting same customize code for different features *13.0.6.3* FREEPBX-13806 Fix validation length *13.0.6.2* FREEPBX-7373 Hide *11/*12 feature codes by default exposed with Advanced Settings or if in deviceanduser mode *13.0.6.1* FREEPBX-13348 - Fix invalid regexp in feature code validation *13.0.6* FREEPBX-12232 Issues if there is a feature code conflict *13.0.5* Add BMO Search provider *13.0.4.1* FREEPBX-10225 Update validation to allow Any valid DTMF digit in any position *13.0.4* FREEPBX-10225 Update validation to allow # *13.0.3* Fixed error reported on the forums *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* Visual Tweaks and fixes *13.0.1alpha1* Consistency changes
